name: Mahjong Patterns
description:
Classic Mahjong game in realtime 3D

HOW TO PLAY

• Match 2 same pattern tile , and remove all pairs from board!

• For other MODS (Time-Blink-Quake-Magic-Puzzle) read explaination when game starts

FEATURES

• Over 150 levels

• 3D graphics & Decor tile Shaders

• Extra MODS (Time-Blink-Quake-Magic-Puzzle) for more fun

• Play offline anywhere

• Rewind record control

• Multilanguage support  over 14 languages

• Hyperthreading optimization

• Available in WINDOWS  7 - 8 - 10 - Ubuntu 16.04 and UP

NOTES

• Mahjong Patterns: Full version 1.0.0

• This game is designed for PC - Tablets - Phones , and supports both ARM  &  x86 and x64 DEVICES.
